tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MalwareMetadata (
    malware_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    malware_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    malware_type VARCHAR(50),
    malware_description TEXT,
    classification_level INT
)

CREATE TABLE Malware_Properties (
    property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name VARCHAR(100),
    property_value TEXT,
    malware_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (malware_id) REFERENCES Malware_Metadata(malware_id)
);

CREATE TABLE malware_metadata (
    malware_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    malware_name TEXT,
    file_size INT,
    file_type TEXT,
    classification TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE malware_properties (
    property_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    malware_id UUID,
    property_name TEXT,
    property_value TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (malware_id) REFERENCES malware_metadata(malware_id)
);

CREATE TABLE malware_metadata (
    malware_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    classification VARCHAR(50),
    detection_engine VARCHAR(50),
    date_added TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE Malware_Metadata (
    malware_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    classification VARCHAR(50),
    detection_method TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Properties (
    property_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    property_name VARCHAR(100),
    data_type VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Family (
    family_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    family_name VARCHAR(100),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Classification (
    classification_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    classification_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE Detection_Method (
    method_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    method_name VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)
